org.gramar

Interface IPluginSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathPluginSource, FileSystemPluginSource, PluginSource

    public interface IPluginSource
    Represents a means by which gramars and extensions can be located and retrieved from the execution environment
    Author:
    chrisgerken

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKnownGramar(String id)
      Tells the receiver that a pattern with the specified ID exists and is retrievable.
      IGramar getGramar(String gramarId)
      Return an IGramar with the given id A gramar is a collection of text templates and a property file.
      ITemplatingExtension getTemplatingExtension(String extensionId)
      Return the templating extension with the given id
      IGramar[] gramars()
      Return an array of available IPatterns.
      String[] list()
      Return an array of String id's for the available IGramars.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        String[] list()
        Return an array of String id's for the available IGramars. Some implementations may not be able to answer this request. In these case, callers must know the desired patternId.

      • gramars

        IGramar[] gramars()
        Return an array of available IPatterns.

      • getGramar

        IGramar getGramar(String gramarId)
                  throws NoSuchGramarException,
                         InvalidGramarException
        Return an IGramar with the given id A gramar is a collection of text templates and a property file. It can be persisted as a zip file named .zip or as a set of individual files in and under a given subdirectory
        Throws:
        NoSuchGramarException
        InvalidGramarException

      • getTemplatingExtension

        ITemplatingExtension getTemplatingExtension(String extensionId)
                                            throws NoSuchTemplatingExtensionException,
                                                   InvalidTemplateExtensionException
        Return the templating extension with the given id
        Throws:
        NoSuchTemplatingExtensionException
        InvalidTemplateExtensionException

      • addKnownGramar

        void addKnownGramar(String id)
                    throws NoSuchGramarException,
                           InvalidGramarException
        Tells the receiver that a pattern with the specified ID exists and is retrievable. This is used for gramars deployed with the GramarPlatform and which are to be retrieved via a PluginSource that can not query for available gramars
        Parameters:
        id -
        Throws:
        InvalidGramarException
        NoSuchGramarException
